improvement_list.improvement_desc: Potential division by zero. Add a check to ensure y is not zero before performing the division.

The value of x will be -49 after the loop. Dividing -49 by 3 results in a floating point number, which might not be expected if z is intended to be an integer. Consider adding explicit type conversion or handling floating-point results accordingly.

Unreachable code. The loop iterates 49 times, modifying x each time. After the loop, the value of x will always be -49 and will not be used. The computation `z = x / y` is redundant because the value of z is not used.
Redundant print statement. The value of y is constant throughout the program.
Redundant print statement. The string "hello" is a constant.
